page.title: List of henchmen in Die Another Day

rev.diff:
Line 128: Line 128:   +
==Mr. Chang==
  +   +
Gender: Male
  +
Affiliaton: Himself
  +
Status: At large
  +
Portrayed by: Ho Yi
  +   +
Mr. Chang is a minor villain in the James Bond film Die Another Day where he is a Chinese intelligence agent who has ties to various terrorists. Like several other minor villains in the James Bond series (e.g. Capungo in Goldfinger, Blofeld in For Your Eyes Only, General Bukharin in Tomorrow Never Dies, etc.) he only appears at the beginning and just threatens Bond briefly before Bond moves on to the main plot of the film. Here after Bond is done being hospitalized on an MI6 ship he emerges in Hong Kong where he stays at a hotel owned by Chang who also acts as the clerk there. Since he and Bond appear to know each other he gives Bond over a room key free of charge although Bond also knows that he's somewhat shady and hart to predict. Later that night a woman named Peaceful Fountains Of Desire enters Bond's room attempting to seduce him although Bond takes out her concealed gun and shoots a wall nearby to reveal Chang and a bunch of other unnamed Chinese men videotaping them. Bond then points out that Chang was planning on having the woman seduce him into telling several MI6 secrets which Chang would then be able to sell to various terrorists for money. Chang however promises Bond that he knows the whereabouts of Zao who is the person that Bond is attempting to track down and will tell him if Chang is spared. Chang then tells Bond that he doesn't know exactly where but that he's in Cuba and that a man named Raoul (who is the head of the MI6 station there) may have a more precise idea. Bond then spares him but not before throwing the camera out the window onto the street shattering it.
